For the new $500, do I have to perform another purchase of the SSB, or is it an automated process where the bank/ whichever platform that will do the purchase for me?Jonathan Chia Guangrong25 Oct 2018You will need to apply manually for each new month that you want to buy into SSB. Not like an 'account' per se where you top up the initial 500. Basically it's a new tranche every month with different rates
